item.title: {About face}
item.description: Your round-up of the latest, greatest data storiesHello iuri,Microsoft is the latest in a line of tech giants to ban the sale of facial recognition software to police until new laws are in place to govern its use. The news comes just days after IBM stated it will no longer support the development or research of facial recognition technology and Amazon announced that police will be banned from using its facial recognition software for a year. Amazon said in a statement ...
